titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The Bps. Of S. Alban's, Worcester, & Colchester came to lunch from Convocation.
I attended the annual dinner of the Voluntary Choir in Jerusalem Chamber. Welldon, as junior canon, had to respond for the Dean & Chapter, & made a tactless, tasteless speech.
